system.effect: Can use Thrown Weapons without a -20 Penalty to WS/BS. Such as: Universal(Primitive, Chain, Shock, and Power). Everyone can throw grenades without penalty by default.

description.value: Can use Thrown Weapons without a -20 Penalty to WS/BS. Such as: Universal(Primitive, Chain, Shock, and Power). Everyone can throw grenades without penalty by default.
